1:
Great is Yahweh and greatly to be praised,\q in the city of our God on his holy mountain.
\q
2:
Beautiful in elevation, the joy of the whole earth,\q is Mount Zion, on the sides of the north,
\q the city of the great King.
\q
3:
God has made himself known in her palaces as a refuge.

\q
4:
For, see, the kings assembled themselves;\q they passed by together.
\q
5:
They saw it, then they were amazed;\q they were dismayed, and they hurried away.
\q
6:
Trembling took hold of them there,\q pain as when a woman is in labor.

\q
7:
With the east wind\q you break the ships of Tarshish.
\q
8:
As we have heard, so have we seen\q in the city of Yahweh of hosts, in the city of our God;
\q God will establish it forever.
\qs Selah\qs*


\q
9:
We have thought about your covenant faithfulness, God,\q in the middle of your temple.
\q
11:
Let Mount Zion be glad,\q let the daughters of Judah rejoice
\q because of your righteous decrees.


\q
12:
Walk around Mount Zion, go round about her;\q count her towers,
\q
13:
notice well her walls,\q and look at her palaces
\q so that you may tell it to the next generation.


\q
14: For this God is our God forever and ever;\q he will be our guide to death.
